mapper.insert: insert into PART_DOC_FILE (part_doc_file_rel_id, file_origin_name, file_save_name, file_save_path, part_amunt, list_order) values (#{part_doc_file_rel_id}, #{file_origin_name}, #{file_save_name}, #{file_save_path}, #{part_amunt}, #{list_order})

insert into BILL (pkid, bill_no, bill_status, send_user_pkid, pd_type, deliver_date, deliver_address, tel, f_show_tel, total_price, money_type, amount, bid_range, bid_start_date, bid_end_date, deliver_way, make_requ, f_open_hide, part_doc_file_rel_id) values (#{pkid}, #{bill_no}, #{bill_status}, #{send_user_pkid}, #{pd_type}, to_date(#{deliver_date}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #{deliver_address}, #{tel}, #{f_show_tel}, #{total_price}, #{money_type}, #{amount}, #{bid_range}, to_date(#{bid_start_date}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), to_date(#{bid_end_date}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #{deliver_way}, #{make_requ}, #{f_open_hide}, #{part_doc_file_rel_id})
mapper.select: select count(*) from BILL t where t.pkid = #{bill_pkid}
mapper.delete: delete from PART_DOC_FILE t where t.part_doc_file_rel_id = #{part_doc_file_rel_id}
mapper.update: update BILL set pd_type = #{pd_type}, deliver_date = to_date(#{deliver_date}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), deliver_address = #{deliver_address}, tel = #{tel}, f_show_tel = #{f_show_tel}, total_price = #{total_price}, money_type = #{money_type}, amount = #{amount}, bid_range = #{bid_range}, bid_start_date = to_date(#{bid_start_date}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), bid_end_date = to_date(#{bid_end_date}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), deliver_way = #{deliver_way}, make_requ = #{make_requ}, f_open_hide = #{f_open_hide} where pkid = #{pkid}
mapper.select: select t2.* from (select t1.*, rownum row_num from (select t.*, count(*) over() row_total from BILL t where t.pd_type = #{pd_type} and t.bill_status = '1' and t.pkid not in (select g.bill_pkid from GIVE_PRICE_MSTR g where g.recv_user_pkid = #{recv_user_pkid}) order by t.create_date desc) t1) t2 where t2.row_num between (#{pageIndex} - 1) * #{pageSize} + 1 and #{pageIndex} * #{pageSize}
select count(*) from BILL t where t.send_user_pkid = #{send_user_pkid} and t.bill_status = '6' and t.f_send_eval = 'N'
select count(*) from GIVE_PRICE_MSTR t where t.bill_pkid = #{bill_pkid}
select u.*, t.f_win_bid from GIVE_PRICE_MSTR t, USER_INFO u where t.recv_user_pkid = u.pkid and t.bill_pkid = #{bill_pkid}
select t.* from SEND_EVAL t where t.bill_pkid = #{bill_pkid}
select t.* from RECV_EVAL t where t.bill_pkid = #{bill_pkid}
mapper.insert: insert into GIVE_PRICE_SLAV (give_price_slav_rel_id, part_name, part_amunt, part_unit_price, part_price_sum, list_order) values (#{give_price_slav_rel_id}, #{part_name}, #{part_amunt}, #{part_unit_price}, #{part_price_sum}, #{list_order})

insert into GIVE_PRICE_MSTR (bill_pkid, recv_user_pkid, give_price_slav_rel_id, total_price, deliver_date, descp) values (#{bill_pkid}, #{recv_user_pkid}, #{give_price_slav_rel_id}, #{total_price}, to_date(#{deliver_date}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #{descp})
mapper.select: select t.* from BILL t where t.pkid = #{bill_pkid}
select t.* from PART_DOC_FILE t where t.part_doc_file_rel_id = #{part_doc_file_rel_id} order by t.list_order asc
mapper.insert: insert into SEND_EVAL (bill_pkid, send_user_pkid, recv_user_pkid, summary_score, out_rate_score, out_qual_score, svc_atitu_score, summary_text, f_anomus) values (#{bill_pkid}, #{send_user_pkid}, #{recv_user_pkid}, #{summary_score}, #{out_rate_score}, #{out_qual_score}, #{svc_atitu_score}, #{summary_text}, #{f_anomus})

insert into RECV_EVAL (bill_pkid, recv_user_pkid, send_user_pkid, summary_score, pay_rate_score, svc_atitu_score, summary_text, f_anomus) values (#{bill_pkid}, #{recv_user_pkid}, #{send_user_pkid}, #{summary_score}, #{pay_rate_score}, #{svc_atitu_score}, #{summary_text}, #{f_anomus})
mapper.update: update BILL set f_send_eval = 'Y' where pkid = #{bill_pkid}
update BILL set f_recv_eval = 'Y' where pkid = #{bill_pkid}
mapper.insert: insert into TEST_TIME_PARSE (pkid, test_time) values (#{pkid}, to_date(#{test_time}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'))
mapper.select: select t.* from TEST_TIME_PARSE t where t.pkid = #{pkid}
select t.* from GIVE_PRICE_SLAV t where t.give_price_slav_rel_id = #{give_price_slav_rel_id} order by t.list_order asc
select round(avg(t.pay_rate_score), 1) pay_rate_avg, round(avg(t.svc_atitu_score), 1) svc_atitu_avg from RECV_EVAL t where t.send_user_pkid = #{send_user_pkid}
select round(avg(t.out_rate_score)) out_rate_svg, round(avg(t.out_qual_score)) out_qual_svg, round(avg(t.svc_atitu_score)) svc_atitu_svg from SEND_EVAL t where t.recv_user_pkid = #{recv_user_pkid}
